languages.text: "Ты эта, не выступай давай. Пасть на замке держи, а то услышу хулу на {mf|Егойную|Еейную} Светлость — пехотки отстрелю!"
"Oi, keep your wisecracks to yourself! If I hear you badmouth {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, I'll shoot your floppers clean off!"
languages.original_text: "Ты эта, не выступай давай. Пасть на замке держи, а то услышу хулу на {mf|Егойную|Еейную} Светлость — пехотки отстрелю!"

"Oi, keep your wisecracks to yourself! If I hear you badmouth {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, I'll shoot your floppers clean off!"

languages.text: “嘿，少给我扯些有的没的！再让我听到你说咱们{mf|老爷|夫人}的坏话，我就把你的卵蛋割下来！”
languages.original_text: "Oi, keep your wisecracks to yourself! If I hear you badmouth {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, I'll shoot your floppers clean off!"

traits.locale_text: “嘿，少给我扯些有的没的！再让我听到你说咱们{mf|老爷|夫人}的坏话，我就把你的卵蛋割下来！”

languages.text: 「オイ、悪口は自分の胸にしまっておけ！陛下の悪口でも言ったら、その詐欺師面を打ちぬくぞ！」
languages.original_text: "Oi, keep your wisecracks to yourself! If I hear you badmouth {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, I'll shoot your floppers clean off!"

traits.locale_text: 「オイ、悪口は自分の胸にしまっておけ！陛下の悪口でも言ったら、その詐欺師面を打ちぬくぞ！」

languages.text: «¡Oye, cuida esa boca! Como insultes a mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¡te arranco las orejas a tiros!».
languages.original_text: "Oi, keep your wisecracks to yourself! If I hear you badmouth {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, I'll shoot your floppers clean off!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Oye, cuida esa boca! Como insultes a mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¡te arranco las orejas a tiros!».

languages.text: "Oi, spart Euch Eure klugen Sprüche! Wenn ich mitbekomme, dass Ihr schlecht über {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} redet, schieße ich Euch das Gebaumel ab!"
languages.original_text: "Oi, keep your wisecracks to yourself! If I hear you badmouth {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, I'll shoot your floppers clean off!"

traits.locale_text: "Oi, spart Euch Eure klugen Sprüche! Wenn ich mitbekomme, dass Ihr schlecht über {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} redet, schieße ich Euch das Gebaumel ab!"

languages.text: « Hé, tes vannes, tu peux te les garder ! Si je t'entends encore une fois dire du mal de Sa Seigneurie, je te tire une balle dans les valseuses ! »
languages.original_text: "Oi, keep your wisecracks to yourself! If I hear you badmouth {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, I'll shoot your floppers clean off!"

traits.locale_text: « Hé, tes vannes, tu peux te les garder ! Si je t'entends encore une fois dire du mal de Sa Seigneurie, je te tire une balle dans les valseuses ! »

languages.text: "Sus bakayım, laf ebeliği yok! Bir daha {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerine terbiyesizlik yaparsan ümüğünü koparırım senin!"
languages.original_text: "Oi, keep your wisecracks to yourself! If I hear you badmouth {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, I'll shoot your floppers clean off!"

traits.locale_text: "Sus bakayım, laf ebeliği yok! Bir daha {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerine terbiyesizlik yaparsan ümüğünü koparırım senin!"
